mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_comment (rev_id, member_id, parent_comment_id, comment_text, comment_reg_date) VALUES (#{revId}, #{memberId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{commentText}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.name AS member_name FROM review_comment c JOIN dv_users u ON c.member_id = u.member_id WHERE c.rev_id = #{revId} AND c.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.comment_reg_date ASC
